p: Animal management and sampling was carried out aiming at minimizing stress and health risks. The experiments were performed in accordance with the Italian guidelines for animal care (DL 26/14) and the European Communities Council Directive (2010/63/UE), and approved by the General Directorate of Animal Health and Veterinary Drugs of Ministry of Health, with authorization no. 444/2019-PR on 12 June 2019.
